H0.text: Who was the only person to win the BBC TV Sports Personality of the Year twice during the 1990's - in 1994 and 1996. Nigel Mansell

H1.text: Who was the only person to win the BBC TV Sports Personality of the Year twice during the 1990's - in 1994 and 1996. Linford Christie

H2.text: Who was the only person to win the BBC TV Sports Personality of the Year twice during the 1990's - in 1994 and 1996. Steve Redgrave

H3.text: Who was the only person to win the BBC TV Sports Personality of the Year twice during the 1990's - in 1994 and 1996. Damon Hill

A4.text: Mansell was awarded the title of BBC Sports Personality of the Year in both 1986 and 1992.

A5.text: Damon Hill won the first of his two awards in 1994, the second coming two years later.
